name: ALTER
describe: Enable use of ALTER TABLE.

name: ALTER ROUTINE
describe: Enable stored routines to be altered or dropped.

name: CREATE
describe: Enable database and table creation.

name: CREATE ROLE
describe: Enable role creation.

name: CREATE ROUTINE
describe: Enable stored routine creation.

name: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES
describe: Enable use of CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE.

name: CREATE TABLESPACE
describe: Enable tablespaces and log file groups to be created, altered, or dropped.

name: CREATE USER
describe: Enable use of CREATE USER, DROP USER, RENAME USER, and REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES.

name: CREATE VIEW
describe: Enable views to be created or altered.

name: DELETE
describe: Enable use of DELETE.

name: DROP
describe: Enable databases, tables, and views to be dropped.

name: DROP ROLE
describe: Enable roles to be dropped

name: EVENT
describe: Enable use of events for the Event Scheduler.

name: EXECUTE
describe: Enable the user to execute stored routines.

name: FILE
describe: Enable the user to cause the server to read or write files.

name: GRANT OPTION
describe: Enable privileges to be granted to or removed from other accounts.

name: INDEX
describe: Enable indexes to be created or dropped.

name: INSERT
describe: Enable use of INSERT.

name: LOCK TABLES
describe: Enable use of LOCK TABLES on tables for which you have the SELECT privilege.

name: PROCESS
describe: Enable the user to see all processes with SHOW PROCESSLIST.

name: PROXY
describe: Enable user proxying.

name: REFERENCES
describe: Enable foreign key creation.

name: RELOAD
describe: Enable use of FLUSH operations.

name: REPLICATION CLIENT
describe: Enable the user to ask where master or slave servers are.

name: REPLICATION SLAVE
describe: Enable replication slaves to read binary log events from the master.

name: SELECT
describe: Enable use of SELECT.

name: SHOW DATABASES
describe: Enable SHOW DATABASES to show all databases.

name: SHOW VIEW
describe: Enable use of SHOW CREATE VIEW.

name: SHUTDOWN
describe: Enable use of mysqladmin shutdown.

name: SUPER
describe: Enable use of other administrative operations such as CHANGE MASTER TO, KILL, PURGE BINARY LOGS, SET GLOBAL, and mysqladmin debug command.

name: TRIGGER
describe: Enable trigger operations.

name: UPDATE
describe: Enable use of UPDATE.
